title Create Trial Workflow

UserInterface->+CreateTrialController: Create Trial
note right of CreateTrialController: Init session object \n UserSelection
CreateTrialController-->-UserInterface: Display Input Screen

UserInterface->+ImportGermplasmListController: Select Germplasm List
note right of ImportGermplasmListController: Store in session object \n UserSelection
ImportGermplasmListController-->-UserInterface: Display Selected List

UserInterface->+ManageSettingsController: Add Environment Variable (n times)
note right of ManageSettingsController: Store in session object \n UserSelection
ManageSettingsController-->-UserInterface: Display added variable

UserInterface->+ManageSettingsController: Add Enironment Condition (n time)
note right of ManageSettingsController: Store in session object \n UserSelection
ManageSettingsController-->-UserInterface: Display environment condition added

UserInterface->+ManageSettingsController: Add Traits (n times)
note right of ManageSettingsController: Store in session object \n UserSelection
ManageSettingsController-->-UserInterface: Display added Traits

UserInterface->+ExpDesignController: Generate Experimental Design
note right of ExpDesignController: Store in session object \n UserSelection
ExpDesignController-->-UserInterface: Display measurement table

UserInterface->+CreateTrialController: Submit collected trial information
note right of CreateTrialController: Store in session object \n UserSelection
CreateTrialController-->-UserInterface: Success signal

UserInterface->+ImportGermplasmListController: Final Save
ImportGermplasmListController->+DatabasePersistenceServices: Persist
note right of DatabasePersistenceServices: This is where most of the time is spent see details below.
DatabasePersistenceServices->-ImportGermplasmListController: Persistance successful
ImportGermplasmListController->-UserInterface: Success signal
UserInterface->OpenTrialController: Redirect to open the created trial
